meanings.sent1: The salad had a vinegarish flavor that made my mouth pucker.
meanings.sent2: The pickles had a vinegarish tang that complemented the sandwich.
meanings.sent3: She wrinkled her nose at the vinegarish smell coming from the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The air was filled with a vinegarish scent, reminiscent of a summer barbecue.
meanings.sent5: The vinegarish taste lingered on my tongue long after I finished eating.

meanings.sent1: The vinegarish sauce added a zesty kick to the dish.
meanings.sent2: The marinade left a vinegarish aftertaste in my mouth.
meanings.sent3: His vinegarish remarks left a sour impression on everyone.
meanings.sent4: The vinegarish nature of the solution helped clean the stains effectively.
meanings.sent5: The vinegarish dressing gave the salad a refreshing twist.

meanings.sent1: The vinegarish color of the liquid hinted at its acidic nature.
meanings.sent2: The old wine had a vinegarish smell due to being exposed to air.
meanings.sent3: The vinegarish texture of the fabric made it unsuitable for delicate garments.
meanings.sent4: The vinegarish taste of the sauce brought back memories of homemade pickles.
meanings.sent5: The vinegarish appearance of the sauce made it look unappetizing.
